title: Bug 114905: Default value set in list box of report parameter lost after modifying the default value
description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: No default value was set in the list box of the report parameter. The OK button is still enabled even after modifying the default value.
EB: The default value should be retained in the list box after modifying it. The OK button should be disabled after modifying the default value.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new report parameter and set the Display type to List Box.
2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK.
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog and directly modify 'aa' to 'aaa'. Click OK.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
5.
